phrases: The Strange Room And The Four High School Boys
That is the keychain Serinuma gave us the other day, right?
It is the new mini dolls!
This is the first time I have seen them!
Um, I guess as thanks for today...
I would like all of you to have one!
She gave us anime character keychains!
Is not it a turn off, though?
Not just the anime characters, but matching ones for us four.
I do not know, I would say it is interesting.
So you are giving up, then?
That is one less rival for me, so I would be pretty happy, personally.
I knew you were pretty athletic, but I did not know you were this good.
It is like I have grown wings!
Wow, someone is getting ahead of themselves.
Now that I think about it,
she was always really fast at the jumping side to side test.
Why are you acting so excited?
The girls' soccer club... needs my help?
Our club has 11 members, which is just enough to play,
and we have got a practice match next weekend, but...
Since you seem so good at sports, I was wondering if you could help.
Seeming good at sports does not mean good at soccer.
You should not just agree without giving it some thought.
I may not look like it, but I know a lot about soccer!
I am a fan of Cap-Tsuba, Ina-11 , and Gi-Killi!
I always supported Gazel from Aliea in Ina-11 !
Is that some kind of good luck charm?
Still, it is my first time playing, so I have to practice.
Do not worry about us at the history club, and do your best at soccer.
Since I am in the soccer club, I think I could help.
Oh, but I have practice after school too, so I cannot be there the whole time.
In that case, Nana can teach you.
Stuff like that cannot be taught overnight.
A total novice with only one week of practice will just get in the way.
That is why I am going to practice!
Tsubasa-kun became friends with the ball because he was with it 24/7!
Th-The length of time does not matter!
It is what you do with it!
You have done nothing with it!
The ball has the right to choose its friends, too!
Anyway, I am not going to have any part in this.
Did he have to put it like that?
I will get good at soccer no matter what!
Let us start with our usual warm-up routine.
After some light stretches, 20 laps around the school grounds.
After that, five sets of 20 sit-ups and reverse sit-ups!
Hands behind your head, and keep your legs together.
You look like a newborn fawn.
Actually, I am not fine at all.
Sure, I lost some weight and can move more freely,
but I forgot I was originally an indoor person,
so I have got no muscle at all!
Should we call it a day?
With proper taping, you can avoid injury.
Nothing less from someone on the health committee!
What do you think of her?
She was not any better today.
Yeah, but it is kind of too late to ask someone else to help at this point.
We will just have to giv
You are the ones that asked her for help.
What is it got to do with me?
What was with that impossible curve ball?
Whenever I kick the ball, it always comes back at me for some reason.
I guess the ball does not want to be friend-zoned!
So this is why they said she was no good.
You know, why do not you just quit?
You can still bow out now, cannot you?
Even if you stumble on a beginner's miracle, that will not cut it for the game.
I felt like I could do anything...
But I took on the challenge anyway!
I do not want to give up!
You probably do something weird whenever you kick the ball.
Maybe your ankle, or follow through.
You do not want to give up, right?
After fighting like that, he sure came back quick.
It is a beautiful thing when people get along.
They are in stoppage time and still down one point.
About two minutes or so left?
Pass it to me at the next throw-in!
What are you going to do?
It is too late to do anything now!
If we give up right now, that will be the end of the match!
The opposing team's goal is really close.
If they clear the ball, it is all over.
But she is facing the wrong way.
I am not sure she will get a chance to shoot.
She kicked it without turning around!
How did it go backwards into the net?
So that is how she decided to turn the tables!
She is got to be stupid!
Did not you say you were going to step aside?
Kae-chan, you smell like your compress.
But it is summer break soon!
If you fail the next test,
you will need to take supplementary classes during the summer.
Just plan on not having a vacation.
She totally bombed the tests she took right after losing weight.
So now she is like that.
She is memorizing English and translating Japanese classics at the same time.
You can tell she is going insane.
If I have to take two weeks,
it will get in the way of the Mirage Saga events,
since they both happen during the day.
I will not be able to say goodbye to Shion.
I really do not want that to happen!
Serinuma-san, you have no problem with Japanese history, right?
What are you the most worried about?
If you like, I can help you study.
As if we would leave you alone with her!
I am going to catch up!
Do you get it up to this point?
This is the first time I have really grasped it.
He makes it so easy to understand.
I can always count on him!
I might be able to do this!
You are in first-year, are not you?
Are you able to follow what we are doing?
I do second-year level work at prep school.
And by the way, you answered question two wrong.
You used the wrong formula, Nana.
I cannot say I could possibly understand why you would answer wrong on purpose!
Nana, you always get so worked up when you are caught red-handed.
Dammit, Igarashi, I will kill you!
We would like to remind our customers to refrain from activities
like studying, or yelling, while in our establishment.
We cannot stay in the library, we definitely cannot stay in the restaurant...
Not many places for group meet-ups, are there?
Well, I was the one who asked for help with my studies.
So I do not mind everyone using my place to work.
They already saw this, so I will leave it alone.
I have to be careful about handling those in front of real boys.
closets were made for times like these!
I will quickly but cleanly put away all my treasures!
Sorry for the lack of space.
I just did a rough clean-up,
so do not look too closely.
And what is with your face?!
and it is been a while since I have prettied myself up.
This room definitely suits Serinuma-senpai, does not it?
More like, what are you guys doing here, anyway?
I do not really understand this part.
Theoretically, is not that what a room date is?!
You are an idiot, so you would fail at the part where you teach her.
A girl's room is something to get a little excited about, is not it?
Like looking at yearbooks together and stuff.
There would only be photos of the old Serinuma-senpai, though.
Or maybe pull the blankets down a bit.
Like you do not want to see!
I did not know these existed.
Hey, my pen rolled under the bed.
I had the store give me the display.
I usually put it up for decoration,
but I decided to put it away for today.
So you had this on display.
But that is the same character as that keychain we got.
Does not he kind of look like Nana?
Kae knows what she is doing.
The spitting image of me when I was young!
Kae has some guests in her room right now.
Well then, shall we get started?
Allow me, her older brother Takuro,
to give you guys a warning, man-to-man!
You were probably lured here by her looks, but do not let that fool you!
This girl is a seriously crazy otaku!
We even gave our condolences to Shion-san earlier.
Not everyone is narrow-minded like you!
There is not a girl out there who hates gay guys!
We are studying here, so if you do not mind...
First, let us tidy up these books.
I can take care of it on my own!
Do not be so rough with them.
They are important to you, are not they?
Mutsumi-senpai, thank you so much for today.
Tell your brother I am sorry, will you?
If you find yourself at a loss, this will help you decide.
I have got one for each of you, too.
That is the first time I have been so excited in a girl's room,
So, this is his way of apologizing?
Serinuma, let us go to the pool.
That sounds like a good idea!
Let us go to a castle mentioned in this.
Set all the otaku events as top priority!
I was a gloomy kid when I was younger.
Everyone said I was delicate, and girls would tease me.
Igarashi was still more popular, though.
You should have played in high school, too.
I want to enjoy the school festivals like normal, then go home.
You get to see your efforts pay off.
I wonder what is supposed to be fun about seeing me cross dress.
I bet you would look good!
Next time: The Clear and Blue Autumn Sky, and Passionate Otome
Cross dressers are the flowers of any cultural festival.
